patterns: Hi I am facing a problem of smoking addiction

responses: ok! When you have started smoking

patterns: No I can’t give you reason behind starting it but it was my personal problem
but it was my personal problem
responses: I respect your privacy. Do you know how many problems can happen due to smoking?

Ok! Smoking causes cancer, heart disease, stroke, lung diseases, diabetes, and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), which includes emphysema and chronic bronchitis. Smoking also increases risk for tuberculosis, certain eye diseases, and problems of the immune system, including rheumatoid arthritis.

patterns: omg! This many diseases can happen because of smoking
